The photo was published on Facebook on M: 2021, and has been shared more than 7,000 times.
The post: s Thai caption states that the dogs were killed by the Myanmar military because they bark when soldiers arrest citizens opposing the coup during the night.
The post circulated as Myanmar: s military continues raids against anti-coup protesters, with the United Nations verifying at least 54 deaths and over 1,700 people detained.
The photo is actually an AFP image depic: Pakistan in 2015, as confirmed by a screenshot comparison and its original publication by AFP.
